SMTools v1.3 API Documentation



This document contains the API documentation for all the SMTools (version 1.3) classes.

See:
          Description

Application GUI development
smtools.application Provides an easy-to-use interface for working with a Swing based GUI.
smtools.application.registry Provides a framework for dealing with a global registry in SMTools based applications.
smtools.application.util Provides utility classes for developping SMTools-based GUIs.

 

Exception handling
smtools.exceptions Provides various classes for exception handling.

 

Mathematical utilities
smtools.math Provides some basic useful mathematical operations.
smtools.math.lslr Provides an implementation for least squares linear regression of 2D data.
smtools.math.quadmapping Provides an implementation for perspective mappings of convex 2D quadrilaterals.
smtools.math.statistics Provides an implementation for estimating empirical probability and cumulative distributions.

 

Miscellaneous
smtools.miscellaneous Provides various classes for converting strings, numbers, dates, times, ...

 

Swing related
smtools.swing.dialogs Provides various dialog boxes.
smtools.swing.util Provides various functional classes for Java's Swing framework.

 



This document contains the API documentation for all the SMTools (version 1.3) classes.
The framework was designed for the Java 2 Platform Standard Edition 6.0 (Mustang) or higher.

When using this framework, please use the following reference:

    SMTools API Documentation (2003-2011)
